div1.p: IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT, IN AND FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, SOUTHERN DIVISION.
Ex Parte In the Matter of Leroy Smith for Writ of Habeas Corpus. & order 3345
MOTION FOR LEAVE TO FILE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS.

The said Leroy Smith respectfully moves the Court for leave to file the accompanying petition for writ of habeas corpus, to be directed to O. P. Halligan, Warden of the United States Penitentiary at McNeil Island, Washington, in whose custody the said Leroy Smith is illegally confined and restrained of his liberty, under and by color of the authority of the United States and in violation of the constitution and the laws of the United States; and for relief by way of certiorari; and the said Leroy Smith respectfully refers to the said accompanying petition for a statement of the facts and the basis of his motion.
John J. Sullivan Counsel for Leroy Smith.
